explains: n. 污秽；肮脏；猥亵；不洁

sentences.en: He would tell her, "Oh, sinful wretch, who is spreading disease and filth like an open sewer."
sentences.cn: 他会告诉她：“噢，可恶的家伙，像露天下水道一样传播疾病和污秽。”

sentences.en: How can you read such filth?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能看这种淫秽读物？

sentences.en: The dialogue was all filth and innuendo.
sentences.cn: 这段对话全是下流的言辞和影射。
